item.title: Pura Scents recalling more than 850,000 diffuser covers as magnet issue may cause ingestion hazard
item.description: Pura Scents is recalling more than 850,000 diffuser covers because some magnets may detach and cause a possible ingestion hazard to children

item.title: Fires engulf Turkey's Mediterranean coast as government declares 2 disaster zones
item.description: New wildfires have broken out on Turkey’s Mediterranean coast and the government has declared two western provinces to be disaster zones

item.title: Asian shares retreat after Alphabet and AI stocks nudge Wall Street to more records
item.description: Asian shares are lower after Wall Street inched to more records as gains for Alphabet and artificial-intelligence stocks offset a steep tumble for EV-...

item.title: Banksy work 'The Migrant Child' removed from Venetian palazzo for restoration and future display
item.description: Art restorers have removed a deteriorating piece of graffiti by the street artist Banksy titled “The Migrant Child” from the side of a building overlo...

item.title: California utility creates compensation program for victims of January's deadly Eaton Fire near LA
item.description: Southern California Edison has announced it will create a program to compensate victims of January’s devastating Eaton Fire near Los Angeles
